sentences.en: I notice he has a goatee and a blue Lakers cap.
sentences.cn: 我注意到他留着山羊胡子，带着一个蓝色的湖人队帽子。

sentences.en: Despite his goatee, Mr Mallya deserves a hearing.
sentences.cn: 不管他的山羊胡子，马尔雅先生需要一场听证会。

sentences.en: He had markings that looked a bit like a mustache and goatee.
sentences.cn: 它的面部还有看起来有点像小胡子的斑纹。
